name: Binge-o-Matic
description: A watchlist management app for the binge-watcher: manage spin-offs and series and watch them in chronological release order.

scripts.start: [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && npm run serve:server:production || npm run serve:server:dev
scripts.serve:server:dev: NODE_ENV=development CLIENT_PATH=build/dev/client nodemon --exec babel-node server/index.js --watch server --ignore server/public
scripts.build:server:production: run-s clean:server:production mkdir:server:production && NODE_ENV=production babel server -d build/production/server --ignore public
scripts.build:client:dev:html: run-s clean:client:dev:html mkdir:client:dev:html && mustache package.json client/index.html > build/dev/client/index.html
scripts.watch:client:dev:html: run-s build:client:dev:html && chokidar client/index.html -c 'npm run build:client:dev:html'
scripts.build:client:dev:css: run-s clean:client:dev:css mkdir:client:dev:css && node-sass --source-map true client/scss/index.scss build/dev/client/css/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css
scripts.watch:client:dev:css: run-s build:client:dev:css && NODE_ENV=development node-sass --source-map true -wr client/scss/index.scss build/dev/client/css/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css
scripts.build:client:dev:assets: run-s clean:client:dev:assets mkdir:client:dev && cp -r client/assets build/dev/client
scripts.watch:client:dev:assets: run-s build:client:dev:assets && chokidar client/assets/**/* -c 'npm run build:client:dev:assets'
scripts.build:client:production:html: run-s clean:client:production:html mkdir:client:production:html && { echo '{"production": true}'; cat package.json; } | json --merge | mustache - client/index.html > build/production/client/index.html
scripts.build:client:production:css: run-s clean:client:production:css mkdir:client:production:css && node-sass --source-map true client/scss/index.scss build/production/client/css/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css && cleancss --source-map --output build/production/client/css/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.min.css build/production/client/css/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css

author: Joe Turner <joe@oampo.co.uk>
